title: Provided further that the power to overrule the advice of the Heritage Conservation Committee shall not be delegated by the Authority to any other officer
clause_text: Provided further that the power to overrule the advice of the Heritage Conservation Committee shall not be delegated by the Authority to any other officer.
section: Restriction on development, Redevelopment / repairs etc.
